TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
BEHOLD, I have come BACK to LIFE!

And I'm in the process of migrating my online presence to the user name:

**problemecium**

So when possible please change my username to the above, as written with no capitals. Thank you!
Done.

I'd like my name to be changed to Mark\_Kerman

> Abstract\_Kerman?
> 

Abracadabra!

This is just a quick question, is it possible to change your username? Or is it permanent once you create your KSP Forums account. I really want to change mine to 'The\_Cat\_In\_Space' or something like that. So is it possible to change your username?

i point thee at:

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/110713-the-name-change-thread-warning-one-time-only/&do=embed"></iframe>

Once. But yes, it is possible.

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/110713-the-name-change-thread-warning-one-time-only/&do=embed"></iframe>

Also, I do not think the underscores are needed.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-05-10T01:46:47Z" title="05/10/2017 01:46  AM" data-short="7 yr">May 10, 2017</time> by qzgy**

wait! one name change? for ever!?!?! what kind of repurposed bovine waste is this! AND WHY ISENT THIS <abbr title="Ascending Node">AN</abbr> OPTION I CAN DO FROM MY ACCOUNT SETTINGS! AND WHY CANT I SET MY NOTIFICATIONS! TO TELL ME WHEN SOMEONE REPLIES TO ME!?!?! WHY IS THIS SITE SO loveING BROKEN!?!?!

i wana change my name to vulduv btw...
AND WHY IS AUTO CORRECT A THING HERE!?!?!

Where to start with that?

One name change is enough, and one more than we'd allow if it were solely up to me. Consistency of name is an important part of an online community, otherwise you have no idea who you're talking to. Unlimited, user initiated name changes would be a very bad thing. 

You can set your notifications to indicate when someone quotes you in a reply. It's in the notifications settings in the notification drop down at upper right (little bell icon). 

We have no autocorrect here, but as you've discovered we do have a profanity filter. Swearing is not permitted here as we try to keep the forum appropriate for all ages. I strongly suggest you review the community guidelines to which you agreed when creating your account. 

As for your name change, we'll consider it when you ask nicely rather than in a profanity laden rant.

Can I please change my name to

SpaceEnthusiast
